name: Evocation
description: Evocation - is a colorful, hardcore platformer that will make you sweat. The main thing you need to overcome all obstacles is perseverance and reaction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB ОЗУ MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB ОЗУ MB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
